Add lobby pad UI and improve sell system

Bash(git -C D:/Kodotag commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add exponential difficulty scaling with special wave types

Difficulty Scaling:
- Exponential growth per wave \(health +12%, damage +8%, count +15%\)
- Player count scaling \(more players = more kodos, higher health\)
- Pad type multipliers \(SOLO easier, LARGE harder\)
- Speed capped at 28 to remain fair

Special Wave Types:
- Boss waves \(every 5\): Powerful boss kodo with 5x health
- Swarm waves \(every 7\): 3x kodos but 40% health, faster
- Elite waves \(every 10\): Half kodos but 2.5x health, 2x gold

Wave announcements now show type and enemy count

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
